name: FootballTriviaGame
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: football trivia game
des: Football is one of the popular games and it is played by approx. over 250 million players in over 200 nations. It has the highest television audience in sports. Here, we are giving 20 GK Questions and Answers on Football in the form of multiple choice question for amateur and sports lovers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
